attributes.action: tell Blizzard to give Rogues plate armour in the next patch in World of Warcraft
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rogues have long since been deprived of that armour we know as plate. We run around like casters, waiting to be mortal struck by our plate rivals. We all know Rogues are the masters of dps, but how can Blizzard possibly justify the damage output of a warrior on leather compared with a rogue on plate? It's criminal!... and no, I'm not rerolling pve! VOTE ROGUE FOR PLATE!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
